content.rendered:
On Saturday 5 and Sunday 6 September, we will organising the Alumax Trial Days in the harbour of Meppel. If you would like to experience one of our boats and get more information about it, these Trail Sailing Days are ideally suited for that.

The following boats will be available:

The Next (electric)
Bull 60 (electric)
Bullit 400 (electric)
Alumax 470 (outboard)
Bullit 600 (outboard)
Bullit 600 (inboard)
Bullit 660 (outboard)
Bullit 540 (inboard)

We apply the following rules regarding the Corona virus:

  • Trail boating is only possible with an appointment;
  • Due to possible contact contamination we have to register your data;
  • A maximum of two people are allowed per appointment;
  • We keep a distance of 1,5m;
  • We take precautions for hygiene.

Appointments are made on the hour. So for example 10:00h and 11:00h.

Would you like to test sail? Please contact us at 0522 24 22 12
